name: GetWindowToChangeSeller
description:
Retrieves a marketplaceâ€™s window to change seller, that is, the period when it is possible to choose another seller to fulfill a given order after the original seller has canceled it.

The default period for this window is of 2 days, but it can be configured by the request Update window to change seller.

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.
